body_html:
We've made a lot of progress on the placement side, which will be detailed in our upcoming ICML paper.

We've also automated data-parallelism in the grappler auto parallelizer. We've tested it successfully on several models and we'll start documenting it as soon as possible.

We're open to a collaboration. Is there any documentation or paper you can point us to to get started thinking about what a common solution could look like ?
body_text:
We've made a lot of progress on the placement side, which will be detailed in our upcoming ICML paper.
We've also automated data-parallelism in the  grappler auto parallelizer. We've tested it successfully on several models and we'll start documenting it as soon as possible.
We're open to a collaboration. Is there any documentation or paper you can point us to to get started thinking about what a common solution could look like ?
body:
We've made a lot of progress on the placement side, which will be detailed in our upcoming ICML paper. 

We've also automated data-parallelism in the  [grappler auto parallelizer](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/grappler/optimizers/auto_parallel.cc). We've tested it successfully on several models and we'll start documenting it as soon as possible.

We're open to a collaboration. Is there any documentation or paper you can point us to to get started thinking about what a common solution could look like ?
